results.title: Prevention of Hypertensive Disorders of Pregnancy:Is There a Place for Metformin?
results.text_hl: Prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pregnancy_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D046110 @@@Hypertensive Disorders of Pregnancy@@@:Is There a Place for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@?

results.title: Effect of Metformin (MTF) Intervention During Pregnancy in Women With Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome (PCOS): A Systematic Review
results.text_hl: ...It was found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MTF@@@ treatment during pregnancy reduced the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pregnancy_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D046110 @@@PIH@@@, @DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@preeclampsia@@@, @DISEASE_Fetal_Macrosomia @DISEASE_MESH:D005320 @@@macrosomia@@@ (abnormally large birth weight), and @DISEASE_Premature_Birth @DISEASE_MESH:D047928 @@@preterm delivery@@@ compared to placebo.

results.title: Review of Prediabetes and Hypertensive Disorders of Pregnancy.
results.text_hl: One retrospective observational study suggested @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, when started early, may reduce @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pregnancy_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D046110 @@@HDP@@@ risk in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Prediabetic_State @DISEASE_MESH:D011236 @@@prediabetes@@@.

results.title: Exercise versus Metformin to Improve Pregnancy Outcomes among Overweight Pregnant Women: A Systematic Review and Network Meta-Analysis
results.text_hl: Our results show no effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pregnancy_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D046110 @@@HDP@@@.

results.title: Research progress of metformin in gestational diabetes mellitus: a narrative review.
results.text_hl: Recent research has also highlighted the clinical value of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ with its application for @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovary syndrome@@@ (@DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@) treatment, reducing @DISEASE_Diabetes_Gestational @DISEASE_MESH:D016640 @@@GDM@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pregnancy_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D046110 @@@gestational hypertension syndrome@@@ risk along with @DISEASE_Abortion_Spontaneous @DISEASE_MESH:D000022 @@@miscarriage@@@ rate in early pregnancy; however, there is no clear consensus regarding the efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment in pregnant @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Gestational @DISEASE_MESH:D016640 @@@GDM@@@ pertaining to its effects on @DISEASE_Congenital_Abnormalities @DISEASE_MESH:D000013 @@@fetal malformation@@@, long-term growth and development of offspring, @CHEMICAL_Blood_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001786 @@@blood glucose@@@ in pregnant @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@, and maternal and infant outcomes.

citations.NLM: Ouyang H, Al-Mureish A, Wu N. Research progress of metformin in gestational diabetes mellitus: a narrative review. Ann Palliat Med. 2021 Mar;10(3):3423-3437. PMID: 33849126

results.title: Effects of metformin and insulin on gestational diabetes mellitus: A dual drugs therapy approach.
results.text_hl: Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ on @DISEASE_Diabetes_Gestational @DISEASE_MESH:D016640 @@@gestational diabetes mellitus@@@: A dual drugs therapy approach.

results.title: Effects of metformin on pregnancy outcome, metabolic profile, and sex hormone levels in women with polycystic ovary syndrome and their offspring: a systematic review and meta-analysis
results.text_hl: Our study demonstrated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment decreased the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pregnancy_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D046110 @@@PIH@@@ and @DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@preeclampsia@@@, and @DISEASE_Premature_Birth @DISEASE_MESH:D047928 @@@preterm delivery@@@ by 55% and 63%, respectively, when compared with the placebo group.

citations.NLM: Zhu D, Chen Y, Huang J, Deng H, Shen X, Lu D, Xu L. Effects of metformin on pregnancy outcome, metabolic profile, and sex hormone levels in women with polycystic ovary syndrome and their offspring: a systematic review and meta-analysis Ann Transl Med. 2022 Apr;10(7):418. PMID: 35530948

results.title: Efficacy and safety of pharmacological treatments for gestational diabetes: a systematic review comparing metformin with glibenclamide and insulin.
results.text_hl: Oral antidiabetic agents, such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Glyburide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005905 @@@glibenclamide@@@, could provide a promising alternative.

citations.NLM: Bodier L, Lous ML, Isly H, Derrien C, Vaduva P. Efficacy and safety of pharmacological treatments for gestational diabetes: a systematic review comparing metformin with glibenclamide and insulin. Diabetes Metab. 2025 Feb 7;():101622. PMID: 39923989
